schema.name: tuva_input_layer
schema.description: The Input Layer is like the API for the Tuva data model. It transforms raw data sources (e.g. claims and medical records) into the Tuva data model. The Input Layer is designed to accommodate both claims and clinical data sources.

table.name: eligibility
table.description: Information about a patient's health insurance coverage and demographics. Each record represents a unique eligibility span for a patient with a specific health plan.

column.name: person_id
column.description: Unique identifier for each person in the dataset.

column.name: member_id
column.description: Identifier that links a patient to a particular insurance product or health plan. A patient can have more than one member_id because they can have more than one insurance product/plan.

column.name: subscriber_id
column.description: Identifier that links a patient to a particular insurance product or health plan.

column.name: gender
column.description: The gender of the patient.

column.name: race
column.description: The patient's race.

column.name: birth_date
column.description: The birth date of the patient.

column.name: death_date
column.description: Date the patient died if there is one.

column.name: death_flag
column.description: A flag indicating if the patient has died.

column.name: enrollment_start_date
column.description: Date the patient's insurance eligibility began.

column.name: enrollment_end_date
column.description: Date the patient's insurance eligibility ended.

column.name: payer
column.description: Name of the payer (i.e. health insurer) providing coverage.

column.name: payer_type
column.description: Type of payer (e.g. commercial, medicare, medicaid, etc.).

column.name: plan
column.description: Name of the plan (i.e. sub contract) providing coverage.

column.name: original_reason_entitlement_code
column.description: Original reason for Medicare entitlement code.

column.name: dual_status_code
column.description: Indicates whether the patient is dually eligible for Medicare and Medicaid.

column.name: medicare_status_code
column.description: Indicates how the patient became eligible for Medicare.

column.name: first_name
column.description: The first name of the patient.

column.name: last_name
column.description: The last name of the patient.

column.name: social_security_number
column.description: The social security number of the patient.

column.name: subscriber_relation
column.description: Identifier that links a patient to a particular insurance product or health plan.

column.name: address
column.description: The street address of the record (e.g., facility location, patient, etc).

column.name: city
column.description: The city of the record (e.g., facility location, patient, etc).

column.name: state
column.description: The state of the record (e.g., facility location, patient, etc).

column.name: zip_code
column.description: The zip code of the record (e.g., facility location, patient, etc).

column.name: phone
column.description: The phone number for the patient.

column.name: data_source
column.description: User-configured field that indicates the data source.

column.name: file_name
column.description: The file name of the source file.

column.name: ingest_datetime
column.description: The date and time the source file was ingested into the data warehouse or landed in cloud storage.

table.name: medical_claim
table.description: Contains information on healthcare services and supplies provided to patients, billed by providers, and paid for by health insurers. Each record represents a unique claim line.

column.name: claim_id
column.description: Unique identifier for a claim. Each claim represents a distinct healthcare service or set of services provided to a patient.

column.name: claim_line_number
column.description: Indicates the line number for the particular line of the claim.

column.name: claim_type
column.description: Indicates whether the claim is professional (CMS-1500), institutional (UB-04), dental, or vision.

column.name: person_id
column.description: Unique identifier for each person in the dataset.

column.name: member_id
column.description: Identifier that links a patient to a particular insurance product or health plan.

column.name: payer
column.description: Name of the payer (i.e. health insurer) providing coverage.

column.name: plan
column.description: Name of the plan (i.e. sub contract) providing coverage.

column.name: claim_start_date
column.description: The date when the healthcare service was provided. Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

column.name: claim_end_date
column.description: End date for the claim.

column.name: claim_line_start_date
column.description: Start date for the claim line.

column.name: claim_line_end_date
column.description: End date for the claim line.

column.name: admission_date
column.description: Admission date for the claim (inpatient claims only).

column.name: discharge_date
column.description: Discharge date for the claim (inpatient claims only).

column.name: admit_source_code
column.description: Indicates where the patient was before the healthcare encounter (inpatient claims only).

column.name: admit_type_code
column.description: Indicates the type of admission (inpatient claims only).

column.name: discharge_disposition_code
column.description: Indicates the type of setting the patient was discharged to (institutional inpatient claims only).

column.name: place_of_service_code
column.description: Place of service for the claim (professional claims only).

column.name: bill_type_code
column.description: Bill type code for the claim (institutional claims only).

column.name: ms_drg_code
column.description: MS-DRG for the claim (inpatient claims only).

column.name: apr_drg_code
column.description: APR-DRG for the claim (inpatient claims only).

column.name: revenue_center_code
column.description: Revenue center code for the claim line (institutional only and typically multiple codes per claim).

column.name: service_unit_quantity
column.description: The number of units for the particular revenue center code.

column.name: hcpcs_code
column.description: The CPT or HCPCS code representing the procedure or service provided.

column.name: hcpcs_modifier_1
column.description: 1st modifier for HCPCS code.

column.name: hcpcs_modifier_2
column.description: 2nd modifier for HCPCS code.

column.name: hcpcs_modifier_3
column.description: 3rd modifier for HCPCS code.

column.name: hcpcs_modifier_4
column.description: 4th modifier for HCPCS code.

column.name: hcpcs_modifier_5
column.description: 5th modifier for HCPCS code.

column.name: rendering_npi
column.description: Rendering NPI for the claim (typically represents the physician or entity providing services).

column.name: rendering_tin
column.description: Rendering provider tax identification number (TIN).

column.name: billing_npi
column.description: Billing NPI for the claim (typically represents organization billing the claim).

column.name: billing_tin
column.description: Billing provider tax identification number (TIN).

column.name: facility_npi
column.description: Facility NPI for the claim (typically represents the facility where services were performed).

column.name: paid_date
column.description: The date the claim was paid.

column.name: paid_amount
column.description: The total amount paid by the insurer.

column.name: allowed_amount
column.description: The total amount allowed (includes amount paid by the insurer and patient).

column.name: charge_amount
column.description: The total amount charged for the services provided, before any adjustments or payments.

column.name: coinsurance_amount
column.description: The total coinsurance charged on the claim by the provider.

column.name: copayment_amount
column.description: The total copayment charged on the claim by the provider.

column.name: deductible_amount
column.description: The total amount charged on the claim by the provider.

column.name: total_cost_amount
column.description: The total amount paid on the claim by different parties.

column.name: diagnosis_code_type
column.description: The coding system used for the diagnosis code (e.g., ICD-10-CM, ICD-9-CM).

table.name: pharmacy_claim
table.description: Information about retail and specialty drug prescriptions filled by patients, billed by pharmacies, and paid by insurers. Each record represents a unique claim line.

column.name: claim_id
column.description: Unique identifier for a claim. Each claim represents a distinct healthcare service or set of services provided to a patient.

column.name: claim_line_number
column.description: Indicates the line number for the particular line of the claim.

column.name: person_id
column.description: Unique identifier for each person in the dataset.

column.name: member_id
column.description: Identifier that links a patient to a particular insurance product or health plan.

column.name: payer
column.description: Name of the payer (i.e. health insurer) providing coverage.

column.name: plan
column.description: Name of the plan (i.e. sub contract) providing coverage.

column.name: prescribing_provider_npi
column.description: NPI for the provider that wrote the prescription (e.g. primary care physician).

column.name: dispensing_provider_npi
column.description: NPI for the provider that dispensed the prescription (e.g. pharmacy).

column.name: dispensing_date
column.description: Date the medication was dispensed.

column.name: ndc_code
column.description: National drug code associated with the medication.

column.name: quantity
column.description: The quantity of the medication.

column.name: days_supply
column.description: The number of days supply included.

column.name: refills
column.description: Number of refills for the prescription.

column.name: paid_date
column.description: The date the claim was paid.

column.name: paid_amount
column.description: The total amount paid by the insurer.

column.name: allowed_amount
column.description: The total amount allowed (includes amount paid by the insurer and patient).

column.name: charge_amount
column.description: The total amount charged for the services provided, before any adjustments or payments.

column.name: coinsurance_amount
column.description: The total coinsurance charged on the claim by the provider.

column.name: copayment_amount
column.description: The total copayment charged on the claim by the provider.

column.name: deductible_amount
column.description: The total amount charged on the claim by the provider.

column.name: in_network_flag
column.description: Flag indicating if the claim was in or out of network.

column.name: data_source
column.description: User-configured field that indicates the data source.

column.name: file_name
column.description: The file name of the source file.

column.name: ingest_datetime
column.description: The date and time the source file was ingested into the data warehouse or landed in cloud storage.

table.name: condition
table.description: Information related to medical conditions patients have, including problems and billable diagnosis codes. Each record documents a unique condition for a specific patient at a specific point in time.

column.name: condition_id
column.description: Unique identifier for each condition in the table.

column.name: person_id
column.description: Unique identifier for each person in the dataset.

column.name: patient_id
column.description: Identifier that links a patient to a particular clinical source system.

column.name: encounter_id
column.description: Unique identifier for each encounter in the dataset.

column.name: claim_id
column.description: Unique identifier for a claim. Each claim represents a distinct healthcare service or set of services provided to a patient.

column.name: recorded_date
column.description: Date when the condition was recorded.

column.name: onset_date
column.description: Date when the condition first occurred.

column.name: resolved_date
column.description: Date when the condition was resolved.

column.name: status
column.description: Status of the record (e.g., condition, test, etc).

column.name: condition_type
column.description: The type of condition i.e. problem, admitting, or billing.

column.name: source_code_type
column.description: The type of code reported in the source system (e.g., ICD-10 code, NDC, lab, etc)

column.name: source_code
column.description: The code in the source system (e.g., the ICD-10 code, NDC, lab, etc)

column.name: source_description
column.description: Description of the source code in the source system.

column.name: normalized_code_type
column.description: The normalized type of code.

column.name: normalized_code
column.description: The normalized code.

column.name: normalized_description
column.description: Normalized description of the code.

column.name: condition_rank
column.description: The numerical ranking of a diagnosis code in a claim. Principle diagnosis code is given a ranking of 1.

column.name: present_on_admit_code
column.description: The present_on_admit_code related to the condition.

column.name: present_on_admit_description
column.description: The description of the present_on_admit_code for the condition.

column.name: data_source
column.description: User-configured field that indicates the data source.

column.name: file_name
column.description: The file name of the source file.

column.name: ingest_datetime
column.description: The date and time the source file was ingested into the data warehouse or landed in cloud storage.

table.name: encounter
table.description: Information about patient visits/encounters, including office visits from clinical sources. Each record represents a unique patient visit with a healthcare provider of a unique type.

column.name: encounter_id
column.description: Unique identifier for each encounter in the dataset.

column.name: person_id
column.description: Unique identifier for each person in the dataset.

column.name: patient_id
column.description: Identifier that links a patient to a particular clinical source system.

column.name: encounter_type
column.description: Indicates the type of encounter e.g. acute inpatient, emergency department, etc.

column.name: encounter_start_date
column.description: Date when the encounter started.

column.name: encounter_end_date
column.description: Date when the encounter ended.

column.name: length_of_stay
column.description: Length of the encounter calculated as encounter_end_date - encounter_start_date.

column.name: admit_source_code
column.description: Indicates where the patient was before the healthcare encounter (inpatient claims only).

column.name: admit_source_description
column.description: Description of the admit_source_code for the encounter.

column.name: admit_type_code
column.description: Indicates the type of admission (inpatient claims only).

column.name: admit_type_description
column.description: Description of the admit_type_code for the encounter.

column.name: discharge_disposition_code
column.description: Indicates the type of setting the patient was discharged to (institutional inpatient claims only).

column.name: discharge_disposition_description
column.description: Description of the discharge_disposition_code for the encounter.

column.name: attending_provider_id
column.description: ID for the attending provider on the encounter.

column.name: attending_provider_name
column.description: Name of the attending provider on the encounter.

column.name: facility_id
column.description: Facility ID for the claim (typically represents the facility where services were performed).

column.name: facility_name
column.description: Facility name.

column.name: primary_diagnosis_code_type
column.description: The type of condition code reported in the source system e.g. ICD-10-CM.

column.name: primary_diagnosis_code
column.description: Primary diagnosis code for the encounter. If from claims the primary diagnosis code comes from the institutional claim.

column.name: primary_diagnosis_description
column.description: Description of the primary diagnosis code.

column.name: ms_drg_code
column.description: MS-DRG for the claim (inpatient claims only).

column.name: ms_drg_description
column.description: Description of the ms_drg_code.

column.name: apr_drg_code
column.description: APR-DRG for the claim (inpatient claims only).

column.name: apr_drg_description
column.description: Description of the APR-DRG code.

column.name: paid_amount
column.description: The total amount paid by the insurer.

column.name: allowed_amount
column.description: The total amount allowed (includes amount paid by the insurer and patient).

column.name: charge_amount
column.description: The total amount charged for the services provided, before any adjustments or payments.

column.name: data_source
column.description: User-configured field that indicates the data source.

column.name: file_name
column.description: The file name of the source file.

column.name: ingest_datetime
column.description: The date and time the source file was ingested into the data warehouse or landed in cloud storage.

table.name: lab_result
table.description: Information about lab test results, including LOINC code and description, units, reference range, and result. Each record represents a unique lab result.

column.name: lab_result_id
column.description: Unique identifier for each lab result.

column.name: person_id
column.description: Unique identifier for each person in the dataset.

column.name: patient_id
column.description: Identifier that links a patient to a particular clinical source system.

column.name: encounter_id
column.description: Unique identifier for each encounter in the dataset.

column.name: accession_number
column.description: The lab order number from the source system.

column.name: source_code_type
column.description: The type of code reported in the source system (e.g., ICD-10 code, NDC, lab, etc)

column.name: source_code
column.description: The code in the source system (e.g., the ICD-10 code, NDC, lab, etc)

column.name: source_description
column.description: Description of the source code in the source system.

column.name: source_component
column.description: The description for the component of the test from the source system.

column.name: normalized_code_type
column.description: The normalized type of code.

column.name: normalized_code
column.description: The normalized code.

column.name: normalized_description
column.description: Normalized description of the code.

column.name: normalized_component
column.description: The normalized component.

column.name: status
column.description: Status of the record (e.g., condition, test, etc).

column.name: result
column.description: The result of the record (e.g., lab test, observation, etc).

column.name: result_date
column.description: Date of the test result.

column.name: collection_date
column.description: Date the test was collected.

column.name: source_units
column.description: Source units of the lab test.

column.name: normalized_units
column.description: Normalized units of the lab test.

column.name: source_reference_range_low
column.description: The low end of the reference range from the source system.

column.name: source_reference_range_high
column.description: The high end of the reference range from the source system.

column.name: normalized_reference_range_low
column.description: The normalized low end of the reference range.

column.name: normalized_reference_range_high
column.description: The normalized high end of the reference range.

column.name: source_abnormal_flag
column.description: Indicates whether the result is abnormal or normal.

column.name: normalized_abnormal_flag
column.description: Normalized abnormal flag.

column.name: specimen
column.description: The type of specimen e.g. blood, plasma, urine.

column.name: ordering_practitioner_id
column.description: Unique identifier for the practitioner who ordered the lab test.

column.name: data_source
column.description: User-configured field that indicates the data source.

column.name: file_name
column.description: The file name of the source file.

column.name: ingest_datetime
column.description: The date and time the source file was ingested into the data warehouse or landed in cloud storage.

table.name: location
table.description: Information on practice and facility locations where patients receive medical care. Each record represents a unique location.

column.name: location_id
column.description: Unique identifier for each location.

column.name: npi
column.description: The national provider identifier associated with the record e.g. facility_npi, provider_npi

column.name: name
column.description: The name of the location.

column.name: facility_type
column.description: The type of facility e.g. acute care hospital.

column.name: parent_organization
column.description: The parent organization associated with the facility.

column.name: address
column.description: The street address of the record (e.g., facility location, patient, etc).

column.name: city
column.description: The city of the record (e.g., facility location, patient, etc).

column.name: state
column.description: The state of the record (e.g., facility location, patient, etc).

column.name: zip_code
column.description: The zip code of the record (e.g., facility location, patient, etc).

column.name: latitude
column.description: The latitude of the record (e.g., facility location, patient, etc).

column.name: longitude
column.description: The longitude of the record (e.g., facility location, patient, etc).

column.name: data_source
column.description: User-configured field that indicates the data source.

column.name: file_name
column.description: The file name of the source file.

column.name: ingest_datetime
column.description: The date and time the source file was ingested into the data warehouse or landed in cloud storage.

table.name: medication
table.description: Information on medications ordered and/or administered during patient encounters. Each record represents a unique order or administration of a medication.

column.name: medication_id
column.description: Unique identifier for each medication in the table.

column.name: person_id
column.description: Unique identifier for each person in the dataset.

column.name: patient_id
column.description: Identifier that links a patient to a particular clinical source system.

column.name: encounter_id
column.description: Unique identifier for each encounter in the dataset.

column.name: dispensing_date
column.description: Date the medication was dispensed.

column.name: prescribing_date
column.description: Date the medication was prescribed.

column.name: source_code_type
column.description: The type of code reported in the source system (e.g., ICD-10 code, NDC, lab, etc)

column.name: source_code
column.description: The code in the source system (e.g., the ICD-10 code, NDC, lab, etc)

column.name: source_description
column.description: Description of the source code in the source system.

column.name: ndc_code
column.description: National drug code associated with the medication.

column.name: ndc_description
column.description: Description for the NDC.

column.name: rxnorm_code
column.description: RxNorm code associated with the medication.

column.name: rxnorm_description
column.description: Description for the RxNorm code.

column.name: atc_code
column.description: ATC code for the medication.

column.name: atc_description
column.description: Description for the ATC code.

column.name: route
column.description: The route used to administer the medication.

column.name: strength
column.description: The strength of the medication.

column.name: quantity
column.description: The quantity of the medication.

column.name: quantity_unit
column.description: The units for the quantity.

column.name: days_supply
column.description: The number of days supply included.

column.name: practitioner_id
column.description: Unique identifier for the practitioner on record (e.g., ordered medication, performed the procedure, etc).

column.name: data_source
column.description: User-configured field that indicates the data source.

column.name: file_name
column.description: The file name of the source file.

column.name: ingest_datetime
column.description: The date and time the source file was ingested into the data warehouse or landed in cloud storage.

table.name: observation
table.description: Information on measurements other than lab tests e.g. blood pressure, height, and weight. Each record represents a unique observation.

column.name: observation_id
column.description: Unique identifier for each observation in the dataset.

column.name: person_id
column.description: Unique identifier for each person in the dataset.

column.name: patient_id
column.description: Identifier that links a patient to a particular clinical source system.

column.name: encounter_id
column.description: Unique identifier for each encounter in the dataset.

column.name: panel_id
column.description: Unique identifier for the panel.

column.name: observation_date
column.description: Date the observation was recorded.

column.name: observation_type
column.description: Type of observation.

column.name: source_code_type
column.description: The type of code reported in the source system (e.g., ICD-10 code, NDC, lab, etc)

column.name: source_code
column.description: The code in the source system (e.g., the ICD-10 code, NDC, lab, etc)

column.name: source_description
column.description: Description of the source code in the source system.

column.name: normalized_code_type
column.description: The normalized type of code.

column.name: normalized_code
column.description: The normalized code.

column.name: normalized_description
column.description: Normalized description of the code.

column.name: result
column.description: The result of the record (e.g., lab test, observation, etc).

column.name: source_units
column.description: Source units of the lab test.

column.name: normalized_units
column.description: Normalized units of the lab test.

column.name: source_reference_range_low
column.description: The low end of the reference range from the source system.

column.name: source_reference_range_high
column.description: The high end of the reference range from the source system.

column.name: normalized_reference_range_low
column.description: The normalized low end of the reference range.

column.name: normalized_reference_range_high
column.description: The normalized high end of the reference range.

column.name: data_source
column.description: User-configured field that indicates the data source.

column.name: file_name
column.description: The file name of the source file.

column.name: ingest_datetime
column.description: The date and time the source file was ingested into the data warehouse or landed in cloud storage.

table.name: patient
table.description: Demographic and geographic information on patients. Each record represents a unique patient.

column.name: person_id
column.description: Unique identifier for each person in the dataset.

column.name: patient_id
column.description: Identifier that links a patient to a particular clinical source system.

column.name: first_name
column.description: The first name of the patient.

column.name: last_name
column.description: The last name of the patient.

column.name: sex
column.description: The gender of the patient.

column.name: race
column.description: The patient's race.

column.name: birth_date
column.description: The birth date of the patient.

column.name: death_date
column.description: Date the patient died if there is one.

column.name: death_flag
column.description: A flag indicating if the patient has died.

column.name: social_security_number
column.description: The social security number of the patient.

column.name: address
column.description: The street address of the record (e.g., facility location, patient, etc).

column.name: city
column.description: The city of the record (e.g., facility location, patient, etc).

column.name: state
column.description: The state of the record (e.g., facility location, patient, etc).

column.name: zip_code
column.description: The zip code of the record (e.g., facility location, patient, etc).

column.name: county
column.description: The county for the patient.

column.name: latitude
column.description: The county for the patient.

column.name: longitude
column.description: The longitude of the record (e.g., facility location, patient, etc).

column.name: phone
column.description: The phone number for the patient.

column.name: data_source
column.description: User-configured field that indicates the data source.

column.name: file_name
column.description: The file name of the source file.

column.name: ingest_datetime
column.description: The date and time the source file was ingested into the data warehouse or landed in cloud storage.

table.name: practitioner
table.description: Information on providers in the dataset (e.g. physicians, physician assistants). Each record represents a unique provider.

column.name: practitioner_id
column.description: Unique identifier for the practitioner on record (e.g., ordered medication, performed the procedure, etc).

column.name: npi
column.description: The national provider identifier associated with the record e.g. facility_npi, provider_npi

column.name: first_name
column.description: The first name of the healthcare provider.

column.name: last_name
column.description: The last name of the healthcare provider.

column.name: practice_affiliation
column.description: Practice affiliation of the provider.

column.name: specialty
column.description: Specialty of the provider.

column.name: sub_specialty
column.description: Sub specialty of the provider.

column.name: data_source
column.description: User-configured field that indicates the data source.

column.name: file_name
column.description: The file name of the source file.

column.name: ingest_datetime
column.description: The date and time the source file was ingested into the data warehouse or landed in cloud storage.

table.name: procedure
table.description: Information on procedures performed on patients. Each record represents a unique procedure performed on a unique patient by a unique provider at a unique time.

column.name: procedure_id
column.description: The unique identifier for the performed procedure.

column.name: person_id
column.description: Unique identifier for each person in the dataset.

column.name: patient_id
column.description: Identifier that links a patient to a particular clinical source system.

column.name: encounter_id
column.description: Unique identifier for each encounter in the dataset.

column.name: claim_id
column.description: Unique identifier for a claim. Each claim represents a distinct healthcare service or set of services provided to a patient.

column.name: procedure_date
column.description: Date when the procedure was performed.

column.name: source_code_type
column.description: The type of code reported in the source system (e.g., ICD-10 code, NDC, lab, etc)

column.name: source_code
column.description: The code in the source system (e.g., the ICD-10 code, NDC, lab, etc)

column.name: source_description
column.description: Description of the source code in the source system.

column.name: normalized_code_type
column.description: The normalized type of code.

column.name: normalized_code
column.description: The normalized code.

column.name: normalized_description
column.description: Normalized description of the code.

column.name: modifier_1
column.description: First modifier for the procedure code.

column.name: modifier_2
column.description: Second modifier for the procedure code.

column.name: modifier_3
column.description: Third modifier for the procedure code.

column.name: modifier_4
column.description: Fourth modifier for the procedure code.

column.name: modifier_5
column.description: Fifth modifier for the procedure code.

column.name: practitioner_id
column.description: Unique identifier for the practitioner on record (e.g., ordered medication, performed the procedure, etc).

column.name: data_source
column.description: User-configured field that indicates the data source.

column.name: file_name
column.description: The file name of the source file.

column.name: ingest_datetime
column.description: The date and time the source file was ingested into the data warehouse or landed in cloud storage.
